attributes.action: Allow any properties sold before 30th June 2021 to still benefit from stamp duty
attributes.additional_details: This would prevent sales falling through for those that didn’t complete purchases before 30th June 2021.
attributes.background: Allow any properties sold before 30th June 2021 to still benefit from stamp duty if the sale is not completed by the 30th June 2021 deadline.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Stamp duty holiday to be triggered upon exchange of contracts: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581308

Extend Stamp Duty Holiday for people that have had an offer accepted: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584239
